cancel_or_delete_task.description: Cancel or delete a task. Running/pending tasks are cancelled, completed tasks are deleted.

props.name: taskId
props.description: The ID of the task to cancel or delete (UUID format)

generate_image_from_text.description: Generates an image using a text prompt via Runway\

props.name: model
props.description: AI model to use for image generation

props.name: promptText
props.description: Describe what you want to see in the image (max 1000 characters)

props.name: ratio
props.description: Resolution of the output image

props.name: seed
props.description: Random seed for reproducible results (0-4294967295)

props.name: referenceImages
props.description: Up to 3 reference images (required for gen4_image_turbo)

props.name: uri
props.description: HTTPS URL or data URI of the reference image

props.name: tag
props.description: Name to reference this image in your prompt using @tag (3-16 characters, alphanumeric + underscore)

props.name: publicFigureThreshold
props.description: How strict content moderation should be for recognizable public figures

generate_video_from_image.description: Generates a video based on image(s) and text prompt using Runway\

props.name: model
props.description: AI model to use for video generation

props.name: promptImageFile
props.description: Upload an image file to use as the video\

props.name: promptImageUrl
props.description: HTTPS URL of an image to use as the video\

props.name: imagePosition
props.description: Position of the image in the video (last frame only supported by gen3a_turbo)

props.name: promptText
props.description: Describe what should happen in the video (max 1000 characters)

props.name: ratio
props.description: Available resolutions depend on the selected model

props.name: duration
props.description: Available durations depend on the selected model

props.name: seed
props.description: Random seed for reproducible results (0-4294967295)

props.name: contentModeration
props.description: Content moderation settings (not available for veo3)

get_task_details.description: Retrieve details of an existing Runway task by its ID

props.name: taskId
props.description: The unique ID of the task to retrieve (UUID format)

props.name: downloadOutput
props.description: Download and return the generated files as attachments (if task succeeded)
